data.text:
Our Crew Loves This Crew! 

In times like this, the best comes shining through. We appreciate our healthcare professionals, security forces and all essential workers in the Caribbean and around the world. Thank you for all you do! #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/r1gYzY2BSB
@lisephen Have a look at the answers, we've just posted them. 😊
@impaul92 @lisephen Have a look at the answers, we've just posted them. 😊
@trinijeannie Correct!
@KarenQuarless Spot on! 👍🏾

*drumroll* 🥁

Did you guess them all? 
 
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean #emojichallenge https://t.co/JsMVEePi0o

The more we distance ourselves from each other, the sooner we’ll be together. While we are miles away from each other, we’re thinking about you every day and look forward to serving you again. #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/KM2eTHMxLZ
@mesosolee Hey there, we're sorry to hear of this. Please send us a private message with more information in order for us to further assist.

data.text:
You may have seen our #emojichallenge on #WhatsApp. Can you crack the code? Answers will be revealed tomorrow.  
Hint: the sound may not always be the actual object but related to it. 
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/LX6v1ZYoKM

As we celebrate #EarthDay, here’s a quick read on how Barbados and Trinidad have been making a difference in the perseveration of nature. Click the link below to read this story (page. 26) and more from #CaribbeanBeat.
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean

https://t.co/cH6yep0C5B https://t.co/zn1jPeW4CS

Our in-flight crew visited another hospital today--The Kingston Public Hospital in Jamaica, to deliver lunch to the amazing frontline staff.  

 #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/GE65KSdgv5

data.text: No need to worry about your award tickets. Place them on hold for future use or re-book and we’ll waive the change fee. More comfortable cancelling your trip? We’ll also waive the re-deposit fee. Conditions apply https://t.co/yZlqfoQv2v #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/ISsW9UqXl6

@RDT628south For assistance with your booking you may speak with a representative by dialing 1-800-920-4225 (US / Canada / St. Maarten) / 1-800-523-5585 (International Calls) / 625-7200 (Trinidad & Tobago Local Calls).  You may also write to us via e-mail at eticket@caribbean-airlines.com .

Our Caribbean Spirit will soar again. Today’s challenges will make us even stronger in the future. Caribbean people know the meaning of resilience! We will rise again, more connected than ever! #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean #motivationmonday https://t.co/e9LWRbniDN

data.text: @RACAblog @dyschick Awesome! We can't wait to take you there again.

Until we can fly again, let’s travel the Caribbean together in photos. 
Show us a pic of your favourite Caribbean destination and tell us a 
little about your last trip:
#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean

data.text:
(2/2) All of our City Ticket Offices remain temporarily closed until further notice. Please click the link below to view reservation/information contact numbers for each office: https://t.co/YZTyNZb3Vw

#iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean

urls.title: Caribbean Airlines | Book flights, cheap tickets & low fares
urls.description: Caribbean Airlines offers Caribbean flights, cheap tickets, low fares, extra legroom & comfort, free meals & inflight entertainment & Caribbean Miles rewards!

data.text: (1/2) In keeping with the guidelines issued by governments across the region, we have temporarily closed all of our Airport Ticket Offices until further advised; with the exception of Trinidad and Tobago, to accommodate domestic flights. https://t.co/yCaKD2UBgc

It’s All Good! We know you had travel plans but right now we need to stay at home and stay safe. No need to worry about your booking as there’ll be no change fees when you re-book. Learn more about how you can use your travel credit for your future travel https://t.co/6Dd8DJyqBE https://t.co/zUxLRW97OD
Right now we must stay apart from each other but we'll see you soon when we soar again #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/0MGenlxgPF
@Tianadc2010 For an update you may contact us by dialing 625-7200 (Trinidad & Tobago Local Calls) / 1-800-920-4225 (US / Canada / St. Maarten Calls) / 1-800-523-5585 (International Calls)

Our Crew loves this Crew!

In the true spirit of Easter, our in-flight crew came together to spread some warmth and love. The team delivered lunch today to the hard-working frontline staff at the National Chest Hospital in Jamaica. 

#iamcaribbean #iflycaribbean https://t.co/No3wkX2lqL

data.text: May this Easter fill us with hope and faith in new beginnings, new opportunities and life anew #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean https://t.co/jKKpZBW2t8

Good Friday comes with so many cherished memories and traditions, like that first warm bite of a hot crossed bun! What are some of your favourite traditions? Have a blessed Good Friday! #iflycaribbean https://t.co/A3KJcc80sM

@RealIndianElvis Hi there,  the notification received on your miles balance was generated automatically by our system.  We are presently working with our system provider to pause these notifications as we have implemented an extension policy to Caribbean Miles.  https://t.co/9lrUXngdUc - Alvin
@Marladukharan All bookings have been temporarily suspended until travel restrictions imposed by various governments have been suspended.
@Marladukharan Our online service for ticket cancellation is ONLY applicable to passengers whose tickets were booked directly with Caribbean Airlines.

Caribbean Miles and Club members, we hope you and your family are staying safe during this time of uncertainty. As the situation evolves, we are doing everything possible to offer you peace of mind for your future travel plans.

Please see update below:
https://t.co/zpzAWUriRu https://t.co/h0fRTMqBjp

data.text:
@draytontiffanie Hi Tiffanie,

If your brother's ticket was booked via a Travel Agency he must liaise with the respective agency for assistance with any cancellations/changes to his booking otherwise contact us by dialing 625-7200 (Trinidad & Tobago Local Calls) daily from 07:00 until 19:00

@Tianadc2010 Hi there,

Our Reservations Department is trying to assist all passengers however during this time they are experiencing a high volume of e-mails and calls.  Your matter is important to us and we appreciate your continued patience during this time.

@Marladukharan Hi there,

We have noted your ticket was purchased via Expedia.  As such, you must liaise with Expedia for assistance with your booking.  Additionally we wish to advise for future reference cancellations and re-bookings cannot be conducted via WhatsApp.

@victoriaaaar You may contact our Reservations department for assistance at +1 800 920 4225 or +1 800 744 2225. Our agents will be sure to assist.

-Alvin

data.text: @gttorress Please click the link below to see what we are doing to help protect our passengers and employees: https://t.co/R3tw6pJeIX

@ChevazC While we understand your expectations and frustrations there are conditions in which refunds and change fee waivers are granted.  To read our temporary change/cancellation policy please visit the link below: https://t.co/wh23iEEiZ4
@christalsomar We are currently doing our best to operate within the travel restrictions imposed by the various governments.  We do apologize for any inconvenience caused.
@itsawrap82 We are unable to offer any assistance via this medium.  We recommend contacting Immigration officials for assistance with your query.
@Marladukharan We do not communicate with passengers via WhatsApp. Additionally any schedule changes will be listed on our website.
@NateGreyy You may also speak with an agent via the LiveChat on our Mobile App or at your local Ticket Office

@NateGreyy Our call centres are experiencing a high volume of calls as such there has been increased wait times.  We kindly ask that your ONLY contact our Reservations Department if you are scheduled to travel within the next 72 hours.

data.text: @Krixydrews Please click the link for information on our temporary change/cancellation policy https://t.co/3RJEsKA1cm
RT @gatechecked: One more of 9Y-TTI in its new @iflycaribbean livery https://t.co/93ydKa3k9I
@badgaljasz We do apologise for this extended wait period and appreciate your continued patience during this time.  Stay on the line and one of our agents will assist you as soon as possible.
@_prasinus_ Prices are affected by varying factors.  Currently we are receiving a high volume of calls from passengers changing their flights as such this may affect the prices shown.

@Miiiitzyyyy Please contact our Reservations Department or visit your closest Ticket Office.  If you are located in Trinidad you may visit us at Port of Spain, San Fernando, Piarco or A.N.R Robinson International Airport in Tobago.

@teachwithlovexo For information on our temporary change/cancellation policy please click the link below https://t.co/lOE3qbxkhr .  Should you require assistance with your booking please contact our Reservations Department or visit your local Ticket Office.
@michellexmish Hi there, our call centre is currently experiencing a high volume of calls and as such there have been increased wait times.  We do appreciate your continued patience during this time.

@RamsayCarolee For information on our temporary change/cancellation policy please click the link below https://t.co/PfwKspqceg .  Additionally we wish to advise all flights are scheduled to depart on-time to their respective destinations.

@tenilleclarke1 we do apologize. Our call centre is currently experiencing an increased volume of calls. Please send us a private massage with your contact details, our agents will reach out to you. Thank you for your patience with us at this time.

@CookiiMonstuur Hi there, our call centre is currently experiencing a high volume of calls and as such there have been increased wait times.  We do appreciate your continued patience during this time.

@GeeDeesFinest All change fees have been waived as per our temporary policy.  Tickets may be placed on hold for future travel on Caribbean Airlines and are valid for One (1) year.  Please contact our Reservations Department for further assistance with your booking.

https://t.co/NfsuxE3s0M

data.text: @herkeriness When booking online fares MUST be quoted in US Dollars.  As your credit card was issued in Trinidad & Tobago your account will reflect the TTD equivalent. You may visit one of our Ticket Offices to purchase your ticket in TTD which are capped at $300.00
@herkeriness This amount would be reflected on your statement as per the conversion rate used by your bank on the date of purchase.

@herkeriness @TradeMinistryTT @TourismTT @MoFTT Tickets prices on our website are displayed in US Dollars and is converted using the USD to TTD rate of he day.   Our RoundTrip fares to Tobago do not exceed TTD $300.00 .

NEW LOCATIONS! Our limited-edition "I AM CARIBBEAN” 2020 Tee is now available at our Ticket Office & Duty Free locations in Trinidad. Pick up yours for only USD 30/ TTD 200 (plus VAT where applicable) while stocks last. For locations, styles & sizes visit: https://t.co/1QEUy1OMzn https://t.co/2J5MR5USeh
@audaciTAY you can visit us at JFK Terminal 4, Departure Level.
